text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Cafeeeeee～ Have you been doing anything fun lately?

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: No.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Hol' up, hol' up. At least give me a more serious answer. Like "Why are you asking me that?". Try to take an interest here.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: …… No.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: In that case, let me explain why I'm here! So, you see, the student council is currently making a new school pamphlet and they need help gathering materials. Have you heard about it?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: I see this as an opportunity. This is a chance to get a favor fro- I mean. I see this as a chance to uphold the school's values.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: That being said, let's go search for some items we can submit for the pamphlet. Anything interesting that comes to mind?

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Do it by yourself. I wish you the best, but I'm already busy doing something else.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Wait, wait. That's not fair! I shared my own personal circumstances. It's only right for you to respond in kind, right?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: What? You're going to see Pokke? By yourself? Well, this is unlike you, Café.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Pokke has been hanging with some horsegirls from outside the school. It seems that something weird might be going on.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: To be honest, I'm not necessarily interested in the specifics of what's going on. But the place that it is happening at…

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: So, you are interested? No, the way you're saying it implies that you know something will happen.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: To tell the whole truth, that place isn't the place you should be around. That's all I wanted to tell Pokke.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: … That's it… You satisfied now?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Kuku — Yes, I'm satisfied, and satisfied, and satisfactorily satisfied, Café! Thanks for the tip!

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: …… What?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Now come, let us go to Pokke together!! This would all make great material!!

text_block_list.name: Uncouth Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: The hell do you want?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: We're looking for Pokke. Is she not here yet?

text_block_list.name: Uncouth Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text: You two are friends with Pocket? Pocket is busy right now. You can talk with me.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: No, we would like to talk directly with her, please.

text_block_list.name: Uncouth Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: Did you listen to anything I just said, huh?! I said, Pocket doesn't have the time for punks like you!

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text: Don't go around putting words in my mouth.

text_block_list.name: Uncouth Horsegirls
text_block_list.text: P-Pocket!? Pocket…!

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text: Hurry up and get lost. These two are my guests.

text_block_list.name: Uncouth Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Utmost apologies!

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text: Wassup, Tachyon, Café!? Sorry about that. Those guys were kind of going off doing their own thing.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: So that was it. They were the cause of the horsegirls not from the school stirring up trouble.

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text: The hell? So even you two have heard that? Let me tell you what actually happened.

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text: Some of my underclassmen friends got together here to participate in an unofficial race. Unfortunately, they lost.

text_block_list.name: Uncouth Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text: They were doing something to cheat! But they're still out here saying stuff like "Tracen Academy is washed up" to provoke us.

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text: I know you're frustrated. Don't worry, I will definitely beat some sense into them.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: … You were planning on starting a fight?

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text: Nothing as lame as that. I was planning on settling it on the course with some hard hitting payback.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Ho ho?! So, you were planning on taking on the other horsegirls in another unofficial race! Kuku, now this is interesting!

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Excuse me, do you mind if I accompany you?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Wait a sec, by "I" you mean "us" right?

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text: Huh? This is my problem.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Oh, what are you saying!? Your underclassmen are just as precious to us as they are to you. Indeed! They are all our beloved underclassmen!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: As fellow students at the same school. As their upperclassmen! It is our duty to uphold their name! Isn't that right!?

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: You can just ignore everything that comes out of her mouth. I just want to make sure that this place can become peaceful again.

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text: Heh! Sure, why not. Just don't hold me back.
